snippet: LEAD: The California Legislature, heeding political and legal constraints on spending, today passed and sent to the Governor a temporary increase in the state's 6 percent sales tax by a quarter of 1 percent to pay for earthquake damage repairs and...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The California Legislature, heeding political and legal constraints on spending, today passed and sent to the Governor a temporary increase in the state's 6 percent sales tax by a quarter of 1 percent to pay for earthquake damage repairs and provide relief to victims.

headline.main: Tax Increase Voted in California For Earthquake Repair and Relief

byline.original: Special to The New York Times
